Container.Name: YggTorrent
Container.Overview:
This application allows you to call up the RSS feed of the yggtorrent site.
It only stores RSS feeds. When there is a change, the application updates itself using the TIME_RELOAD variable and deletes information that is no longer in the feed.
The first update can take a long time, as the application calls up all the RSS feeds even if you don't want all the information.
In the graphical interface, you can choose to display the feeds you want by going to Settings.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: PASSKEY
Config.Description: The passkey can be found in: my account on yygtorrent

Config.Name: TIME_RELOAD
Config.Description: Variable that determines the RSS feed refresh time. Choose between m(minutes) and h(hour). Ex: 10m or 2h, ...

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: This is the port for the web page to access the UI. Default: 3000

Config.Name: PORT Server
Config.Description: This is the port of the server requesting the yygtorrent RSS feed. It is important if you are using reverse proxy. Default 8080

Config.Name: API_URL
Config.Description: URL of the UI if you are using a reverse proxy
